com.wizturn.sdk.connection

Class BLEConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizturn.sdk.connection.BLEConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CentralStateProviderGetter, MultipleChangeBinarySemaphore, PeripheralProvider

    public class BLEConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements CentralStateProviderGetter, MultipleChangeBinarySemaphore, PeripheralProvider
    This class provides a way to connect to a peripheral(mostly Beacon). Read the beacon information when the beacon is connected.
    Author:
    jayjay

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connects to the bluetooth device by GATT profile. If the connection doesn't finish within 10 seconds, it will be canceled after 10 seconds.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects with the bluetooth device.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Indicates whether the connection with the bluetooth device is now ongoing or not.
        Returns:
        Returns true if connection is successfully established with the bluetooth device.

      • hasAuthentication

        public boolean hasAuthentication()
        Indicates whether the peripheral has authentication or not.
        Returns:
        Returns true if beacon has authentication step, false otherwise.

      • setPeripheralAccessListener

        public boolean setPeripheralAccessListener(PeripheralAccessListener listener)
        Sets PeripheralAccessListener
        Parameters:
        listener - an instance of PeripheralAccessListener
        Returns:
        Returns true if PeripheralAccessListener is successfully set, false otherwise

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(java.lang.String password)
        Try to authentication. Password must be authenticated in 5 seconds. (or 30 seconds.)
        Parameters:
        password - Password for authentication
        listener -
